Please Support Bradford's City Park

Bradford has reached the final stages of a Big Lottery Bid for £24.5 million to build a Park at the Heart of the city. They need your support!

Bradford Photography Competition - Win an iPod nano

Students4Bradford.co.uk in co-operation with Bradford Centre Regeneration has organised a photographic competition. The theme is 'Changing Bradford', as seen through your eyes.

The University once again is running the Staff Satisfaction Survey. It launches on April 16th and will run for 3 weeks.
